Post-Match Reflections: Luka Dončić acknowledged he's not at 100% health and promised to improve after scoring 16 points with 6 rebounds and 6 assists in the Mavericks' 110-93 win over the Spurs.
The victory snapped the Mavericks' four-game losing streak and improved their record to 6-7.
Dončić's performance was below his usual standards due to health issues, including a recurring knee bleed and frequent injuries.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a badly needed win for the Mavericks, ending a four-game losing streak and providing a boost in morale.
Dončić's comments highlighted the importance of his health to the team's performance and future success.
